issue.title: Give parameters into included models in a SDF

content.raw: Did this get documented somewhere? Should this work the same for ``` libgazebo_ros_joint_pose_trajectory.so```? I was trying to use a similar method to the one Steven mentioned for the polaris model, but it didn't seem to work. There was a ```/set_joint_trajectory``` rostopic available, but it didn't seem to control the model.
content.html: Did this get documented somewhere? Should this work the same for libgazebo_ros_joint_pose_trajectory.so? I was trying to use a similar method to the one Steven mentioned for the polaris model, but it didn't seem to work. There was a /set_joint_trajectory rostopic available, but it didn't seem to control the model.
